benefit: The world's leading software development platform.
description: GitHub is where over 100 million developers shape the future of software, together. Contribute to the open source community, manage your Git repositories, review code like a pro, track bugs and features, power your CI/CD and DevOps workflows, and secure software before you ship it.

benefit: A powerful, lightweight code editor for modern web development.
description: Visual Studio Code is a free source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded Git.

benefit: Securely build, share and run any application, anywhere.
description: Docker helps developers build, share, and run applications anywhere. It provides a platform to develop, ship, and run applications in containers, which are lightweight and portable.
Supabase provides a suite of tools to build your backend in a weekend. It includes a Postgres database, Authentication, instant APIs, Edge Functions, Realtime subscriptions, and Storage.
